Sentencas: The generation of electrical energy from biogas is state of the art.
Titulo: Investigation of NH3 Influence on Adsorptive H2S Removal from Biogas for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Application

Sentencas: One option is the application of fuel cells for generating electrical energy.
Titulo: Investigation of NH3 Influence on Adsorptive H2S Removal from Biogas for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Application

Sentencas: Due to their construction, the materials used and their mode of operation, solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are particularly suitable.
Titulo: Investigation of NH3 Influence on Adsorptive H2S Removal from Biogas for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Application

Sentencas: The primary problem in the operation of SOFCs using biogas is H2S. The goal of this work is to investigate the possible effects of ammonia on different sorbents that have already successfully been used for the desulfurization of biogas.
Titulo: Investigation of NH3 Influence on Adsorptive H2S Removal from Biogas for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Application

Sentencas: The H2S adsorption capacity of four commercially available sorbents in the presence of NH3 was investigated as well as the influence of an upstream NH3 removal.
Titulo: Investigation of NH3 Influence on Adsorptive H2S Removal from Biogas for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Application

Sentencas: The CuO-MnO-based sorbent showed the best performance related to sulfur uptake.
Titulo: Investigation of NH3 Influence on Adsorptive H2S Removal from Biogas for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Application
